Prerequisite(s): Two Leaden Hyena Maneuvers
Range: Melee or Ranged
Target: One creature
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

Your foe becomes wholly rattled as its body is torn apart, its might pouring from every gash in its body. Make an attack roll against a creature. On a successful hit, the attack deals an additional [[2d4]] points of Strength damage and causes 2 points of Strength bleed every round. This bleeding can be stopped by a Heal check (DC 15 + your initiator level) or by healing magic. However, any creature that attempts healing magic on the target must make a caster level check with a DC identical to the Heal check or have the spell fail to stop the bleeding.
